olly Fowes was an investigative journalist who wrote for the Baldurs Mouth broadsheet from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Holly Fowes had been working at the Baldurs Mouth Gazette until the Absolute crisis of the . She realized that the broadsheets new sponsor, Lord Enver Gortash, was in control of the information being dispensed by Ettvard Needles publication. In one of her articles to be published, Holly wrote a scathing opinion on Lord Gortash and the rot at the core of Baldurs Gate he represented. She fully understood that penning the article meant losing her job, and she signed the manuscript as a "Newly Freelance" journalist and for Ettvard to consider it a letter of resignation. The editor-in-chief, Ettvard Needle, immediately discharged Holly, citing her work to be libelous behavior, conspiracy, and intimidation, and herself to be "a toxic, unjournalistic presence in the workplace." Ettvard did not accept her resignation and instead fired Holly without pay and threatened her future work with legal action.
